item.description:
Let's try a new date! It doesn't seem many people are around on 8/20, so let's try Friday, 9/3!

Event description still goes a little something like this:

After a long week, sometimes all you need are a few drinks, a few friendly faces, and an awesome band to shake your @ss too! Well, that's what we have in store on the evening of Friday September 3rd! Come on out and join Wedeln at The Green Dragon in Faneuil Hall. Project DCQ is a Wedeln favorite, a band composed of Berkeley graduates that play everything you can imagine, including your current favorites. They've played our golf tourney three years in a row and we've seen them around Boston too! Come join us on Friday 9/3 to kick off the start of your Labor Day Weekend!

There may be a cover charge around $5. I'll post exact amount once I find out.
item.how_to_find_us: For anyone that I don't know, I'll reach out to them to arrange to meet up.
item.name: TGIF Celebration w/Wedeln and Project DCQ @ The Green Dragon
